pages.text: $(italic)Whenever you leave your home sweet home, you carry half a tool shed with you. This is very bulky, but not really worth mentioning, since you can also carry tons of stone. Nevertheless, a universal tool that combines the abilities of a pickaxe, axe and shovel would suit you. It's not as efficient in the individual tasks, but it's much better than having to change tools every three seconds.$()
The multitool serves as a pickaxe, axe and shovel at the same time. However, due to its special shape, it can not be formed from diamond, but only from iron.
